segments.text: Where can I find a spare hose for the pump ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're at the back of the stores , second shelf up on the right-hand side .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Have you got any light bulbs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're in the blue cupboard . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll need to check . Sorry , we don ’ t have any in stock . But I can order some and send through the order today . How many do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . They should be here the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
